Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): OscARTM PCR nucleic acid amplification technology
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Mesa Biotech Accula Flu A/Flu B Test for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA using nasal swabs and PCR/lateral flow technologies
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative visual detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA from nasal swabs of patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, as an aid in diagnosis of influenza infection in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors; not for influenza C detection
